verses.verse: The <S%H2377>vision<s%> of <S%H3470>Isaiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H531>Amoz,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he <S%H2372>saw<s%> <S%H5921>concerning<s%> <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> in the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H5818>Uzziah,<s%> <S%H3147>Jotham,<s%> <S%H271>Ahaz,<s%> and <S%H3169>Hezekiah,<s%> <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah.<s%>

Hear, <S%H8085><s%> O <S%H8064>heavens,<s%> and give <S%H238>ear,<s%> O <S%H776>earth:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath <S%H1696>spoken,<s%> I have <S%H1431>nourished<s%> and brought <S%H7311>up<s%> <S%H1121>children,<s%> and <S%H1992>they<s%> have <S%H6586>rebelled<s%> against me.

The <S%H7794>ox<s%> <S%H3045>knoweth<s%> his <S%H7069>owner,<s%> and the <S%H2543>ass<s%> his <S%H1167>master's<s%> <S%H18>crib:<s%> but <S%H3478>Israel<s%> doth <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H3045>know,<s%> my <S%H5971>people<s%> doth <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H995>consider.<s%>

Ah <S%H1945><s%> <S%H2398>sinful<s%> <S%H1471>nation,<s%> a <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3515>laden<s%> with <S%H5771>iniquity,<s%> a <S%H2233>seed<s%> of <S%H7489>evildoers,<s%> <S%H1121>children<s%> that are <S%H7843>corrupters:<s%> they have <S%H5800>forsaken<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> they have <S%H5006>provoked<s%> <S%H853><s%> the Holy <S%H6918>One<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> unto anger, they are gone <S%H2114>away<s%> <S%H268>backward.<s%>

Why <S%H5921><s%> <S%H4100><s%> should ye be <S%H5221>stricken<s%> any <S%H5750>more?<s%> ye will <S%H5627>revolt<s%> more and <S%H3254>more:<s%> the <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H7218>head<s%> is <S%H2483>sick,<s%> and the <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H3824>heart<s%> <S%H1742>faint.<s%>

From the <S%H4480>sole<s%> <S%H3709><s%> of the <S%H7272>foot<s%> even <S%H5704>unto<s%> the <S%H7218>head<s%> there is <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H4974>soundness<s%> in it; but <S%H6482>wounds,<s%> and <S%H2250>bruises,<s%> and <S%H2961>putrefying<s%> <S%H4347>sores:<s%> they have <S%H3808>not<s%> been <S%H2115>closed,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> bound <S%H2280>up,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> <S%H7401>mollified<s%> with <S%H8081>ointment.<s%>

Your <S%H776>country<s%> is <S%H8077>desolate,<s%> your <S%H5892>cities<s%> are <S%H8313>burned<s%> with <S%H784>fire:<s%> your <S%H127>land,<s%> <S%H2114>strangers<s%> <S%H398>devour<s%> it in your <S%H5048>presence,<s%> and it is <S%H8077>desolate,<s%> as <S%H4114>overthrown<s%> by <S%H2114>strangers.<s%>

And the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H6726>Zion<s%> is <S%H3498>left<s%> as a <S%H5521>cottage<s%> in a <S%H3754>vineyard,<s%> as a <S%H4412>lodge<s%> in a garden of <S%H4750>cucumbers,<s%> as a <S%H5341>besieged<s%> <S%H5892>city.<s%>

Except <S%H3884><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%> had <S%H3498>left<s%> unto us a very <S%H4592>small<s%> <S%H8300>remnant,<s%> we should have <S%H1961>been<s%> as <S%H5467>Sodom,<s%> and we should have been <S%H1819>like<s%> unto <S%H6017>Gomorrah.<s%>

Hear <S%H8085><s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> ye <S%H7101>rulers<s%> of <S%H5467>Sodom;<s%> give <S%H238>ear<s%> unto the <S%H8451>law<s%> of our <S%H430>God,<s%> ye <S%H5971>people<s%> of <S%H6017>Gomorrah.<s%>

To <S%H4100>what<s%> purpose is the <S%H7230>multitude<s%> of your <S%H2077>sacrifices<s%> unto me? <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> I am <S%H7646>full<s%> of the burnt <S%H5930>offerings<s%> of <S%H352>rams,<s%> and the <S%H2459>fat<s%> of fed <S%H4806>beasts;<s%> and I <S%H2654>delight<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> in the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of <S%H6499>bullocks,<s%> or of <S%H3532>lambs,<s%> or of he <S%H6260>goats.<s%>

When <S%H3588><s%> ye <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H7200>appear<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> me, <S%H4310>who<s%> hath <S%H1245>required<s%> <S%H2063>this<s%> at your <S%H4480>hand,<s%> <S%H3027><s%> to <S%H7429>tread<s%> my <S%H2691>courts?<s%>

Bring <S%H935><s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H3254>more<s%> <S%H7723>vain<s%> <S%H4503>oblations;<s%> <S%H7004>incense<s%> is an <S%H8441>abomination<s%> unto me; the new <S%H2320>moons<s%> and <S%H7676>sabbaths,<s%> the <S%H7121>calling<s%> of <S%H4744>assemblies,<s%> I <S%H3808>cannot<s%> <S%H3201><s%> away with; it is <S%H205>iniquity,<s%> even the solemn <S%H6116>meeting.<s%>

Your new <S%H2320>moons<s%> and your appointed <S%H4150>feasts<s%> my <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H8130>hateth:<s%> they <S%H1961>are<s%> a <S%H2960>trouble<s%> unto <S%H5921>me;<s%> I am <S%H3811>weary<s%> to <S%H5375>bear<s%> them.

And when ye spread <S%H6566>forth<s%> your <S%H3709>hands,<s%> I will <S%H5956>hide<s%> mine <S%H5869>eyes<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> you: <S%H1571>yea,<s%> <S%H3588>when<s%> ye make <S%H7235>many<s%> <S%H8605>prayers,<s%> I will <S%H369>not<s%> <S%H8085>hear:<s%> your <S%H3027>hands<s%> are <S%H4390>full<s%> of <S%H1818>blood.<s%>

Wash <S%H7364><s%> you, make you <S%H2135>clean;<s%> put <S%H5493>away<s%> the <S%H7455>evil<s%> of your <S%H4611>doings<s%> from <S%H4480>before<s%> <S%H5048><s%> mine <S%H5869>eyes;<s%> <S%H2308>cease<s%> to do <S%H7489>evil;<s%>

Learn <S%H3925><s%> to do <S%H3190>well;<s%> <S%H1875>seek<s%> <S%H4941>judgment,<s%> <S%H833>relieve<s%> the <S%H2541>oppressed,<s%> <S%H8199>judge<s%> the <S%H3490>fatherless,<s%> <S%H7378>plead<s%> for the <S%H490>widow.<s%>

Come <S%H1980><s%> <S%H4994>now,<s%> and let us reason <S%H3198>together,<s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> <S%H518>though<s%> your <S%H2399>sins<s%> <S%H1961>be<s%> as <S%H8144>scarlet,<s%> they shall be as <S%H3835>white<s%> as <S%H7950>snow;<s%> <S%H518>though<s%> they be <S%H119>red<s%> like <S%H8438>crimson,<s%> they shall <S%H1961>be<s%> as <S%H6785>wool.<s%>
If <S%H518><s%> ye be <S%H14>willing<s%> and <S%H8085>obedient,<s%> ye shall <S%H398>eat<s%> the <S%H2898>good<s%> of the land: <S%H776><s%>

But <S%H518>if<s%> ye <S%H3985>refuse<s%> and <S%H4784>rebel,<s%> ye shall be <S%H398>devoured<s%> with the <S%H2719>sword:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath <S%H1696>spoken<s%> it.

How <S%H349><s%> is the <S%H539>faithful<s%> <S%H7151>city<s%> <S%H1961>become<s%> a <S%H2181>harlot!<s%> it was <S%H4392>full<s%> of <S%H4941>judgment;<s%> <S%H6664>righteousness<s%> <S%H3885>lodged<s%> in it; but <S%H6258>now<s%> <S%H7523>murderers.<s%>
Thy <S%H3701>silver<s%> is <S%H1961>become<s%> <S%H5509>dross,<s%> thy <S%H5435>wine<s%> <S%H4107>mixed<s%> with water: <S%H4325><s%>

Thy <S%H8269>princes<s%> are <S%H5637>rebellious,<s%> and <S%H2270>companions<s%> of <S%H1590>thieves:<s%> every <S%H3605>one<s%> <S%H157>loveth<s%> <S%H7810>gifts,<s%> and followeth <S%H7291>after<s%> <S%H8021>rewards:<s%> they <S%H8199>judge<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> the <S%H3490>fatherless,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> doth the <S%H7379>cause<s%> of the <S%H490>widow<s%> <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> them.

Therefore <S%H3651><s%> <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H113>Lord,<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> the mighty <S%H46>One<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H1945>Ah,<s%> I will <S%H5162>ease<s%> me of mine <S%H4480>adversaries,<s%> <S%H6862><s%> and <S%H5358>avenge<s%> me of mine <S%H4480>enemies:<s%> <S%H341><s%>

And I will <S%H7725>turn<s%> my <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> thee, and <S%H1252>purely<s%> purge <S%H6884>away<s%> thy <S%H5509>dross,<s%> and take <S%H5493>away<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> thy tin: <S%H913><s%>

And I will <S%H7725>restore<s%> thy <S%H8199>judges<s%> as at the <S%H7223>first,<s%> and thy <S%H3289>counselors<s%> as at the <S%H8462>beginning:<s%> <S%H310>afterward<s%> <S%H3651><s%> thou shalt be <S%H7121>called,<s%> The <S%H5892>city<s%> of <S%H6664>righteousness,<s%> the <S%H539>faithful<s%> <S%H7151>city.<s%>
Zion <S%H6726><s%> shall be <S%H6299>redeemed<s%> with <S%H4941>judgment,<s%> and her <S%H7725>converts<s%> with <S%H6666>righteousness.<s%>

And the <S%H7667>destruction<s%> of the <S%H6586>transgressors<s%> and of the <S%H2400>sinners<s%> shall be <S%H3162>together,<s%> and they that <S%H5800>forsake<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall be <S%H3615>consumed.<s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> ye shall <S%H1961>be<s%> as an <S%H424>oak<s%> whose <S%H5929>leaf<s%> <S%H5034>fadeth,<s%> and as a <S%H1593>garden<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> hath <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H4325>water.<s%>
